* @param taskName which is the name of the task

Deadline deadline = new Deadline("Read a book", by);
assertEquals("D", deadline.getTaskType(), "Task type for Deadline should be 'D'");
Deadline deadline = new Deadline("Read a book", by);
// Expected output format for a deadline
String expected = "[D][ ] Read a book (by: Oct 20 2024 12:10)";
assertEquals(expected, deadline.toString(), "toString should return formatted deadline string");
assertEquals(expected, deadline.toString(), "toString should show deadline as done after marking");
Deadline deadline = new Deadline("Read a book", by);
// Expected file storage format for a deadline
assertEquals(expected, deadline.toFileString(), "toFileString should return formatted string for file storage");
assertEquals(expected, deadline.toFileString(), "toFileString should indicate deadline completion after marking as done");
Event event = new Event("Read a book", from, to);

Event event = new Event("Read a book", from, to);
// Expected output format for an event

assertEquals(expected, event.toString(), "toString should return formatted event string");
expected = "[E][] Read a book (from: Oct 20 2024 12:10 to: Oct 20 2024 13:10)";
assertEquals(expected, event.toString(), "toString should show event as done after marking");
Event event = new Event("Read a book", from, to);
// Expected file storage format for an event
assertEquals(expected, event.toFileString(), "toFileString should return formatted string for file storage");
assertEquals(expected, event.toFileString(), "toFileString should indicate event completion after marking as done");

Task task = new Task("Read a book");
assertFalse(task.isDone, "Task should be marked as not done");
Task task = new Task("Read a book");
// Test for the task before set it to complete

// Test after the task is complete

Task task = new Task("Read a book");
// Expected output for normal task type
assertEquals(expected, task.toString(), "To String should return formatted task string");
assertEquals(expected, task.toString(), "To String should show task as done.");
Task task = new Task("Read a book");
// Expected format for duke.txt file for undone task
assertEquals(expected, task.toFileString(), "toFileString should return formatted string for file storage");
// Expected format for duke.txt file for done task
assertEquals(expected, task.toFileString(), "toFileString should indicate task completion after marking as done");
ToDo todo = new ToDo("Read a book");
assertEquals("T", todo.getTaskType(), "Task type for ToDo should be 'T'");
ToDo todo = new ToDo("Read a book");
// Expected output format for a ToDo task
assertEquals(expected, todo.toString(), "toString should return formatted ToDo string");
assertEquals(expected, todo.toString(), "toString should show ToDo as done after marking");
